What to do when you're porting a module, and it implements a hook that has been deprecated in Backdrop, but there's no change record and no information as to what you should use instead...? https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/2819

hook_views_handlers() removed. Add change record. 路 Issue #2819 路 backdrop/backdrop-issues
It looks like hook_views_handlers() was removed from backdrop, but we didn't add a change record. At the very least we should state that this is not needed in Backdrop, and why.
